column4: anybody a clue where I can get more specialized support on intel integrated graphic cards for linux?
I really can't figure out why the external monitors don't work but I really don't know how to debug it either
for my intel laptop. the first time i plugged in a external monitor. I had to use the laptops fn keys to enable it. then the monitors tool saw it and let me tweak the config.

the problem is harder. Several people tried to help to no avail. The screen waves and jitters but I am using the correct refresh rates, and I tried with two different monitors which work under windows on the same machione
